INDIANAPOLIS (WTHR) — For the second year in a row
column2: the OneAmerica 500 Festival Mini-Marathon has been named "America's Best Half Marathon" by Bib Rave 100.

column1: The list is created using participant votes and surveys from within the running industry.
The Indy Mini also ranked in the top 10 for best weekend experiences and was recently named one of the "Most Iconic Races in America" by Runner's World.
